'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.7''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on October 22, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/268|title=Release 1.1.7 (1.21.130.22)|website=GitHub|date=October 22, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40528922585613-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-22|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.22|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 22, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added new {{cd|IModalDialog}} API to create scripted dialog windows. They can be registered from {{cd|IModalDialogManager}}, and then activated like core dialogs.
* Added new selection tool utility "Quick Move" mode that allows to easily move the contents of a selection in any one direction. Can also specify a specific destination.

== Changes ==
* Updated the settings for UI Settings, Tutorial, Keyboard and Graphics mode, users need to manually save these settings.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that updated the rotation range to (-360~360) for Summon tool and Brush tool.
